1074020.name: Hunted Gods Demo
1074020.description: You're a 14-year-old orphan on an epic quest to find your little sister who was kidnapped by a giant. To climb to the top of the Interdimensional Tree to find her, you must defeat several titans and assimilate their power, hitting their weak spots with your taut bow. Giants Slayers is a colossal FPS in an open and fascinating world. "I feel inner peace in you," the crazy bird tells you, "and tranquility is the mother of courage".
1074020.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
